channel.title: Configuration on My cool site
channel.description: Recent content in Configuration on My cool site

item.title: Complete Frontmatter Options Reference
item.description: Complete reference guide to all available frontmatter options for podcast episodes, with examples, descriptions, and best practices.

item.title: Customizing Episode Metadata: Complete Reference
item.description: Learn how to customize all episode metadata fields including episode numbers, seasons, hosts, guests, duration, and more.

item.title: Episode Types: Full, Bonus, Trailer, Interview & Solo
item.description: Learn about all available episode types: full, bonus, trailer, interview, and solo episodes with examples and use cases for each.
